fields.name: location_ping_id
fields.description: Identifies the recorded vehicle location event.

fields.name: stop_sequence
fields.title: positive integer referencing GTFS stop_times.stop_sequence
fields.description: Ordered stop the vehicle is approaching or serving on a particular trip. References GTFS

fields.name: device_id
fields.title: ID references devices.device_id
fields.description: Identifies the device that recorded the vehicle location. May be null if only a single device is reporting vehicle location and the device_id is not distinct from vehicle_id.

fields.name: stop_id
fields.title: ID referencing GTFS stops.stop_id
fields.description: Identifies the stop the vehicle is approaching or serving currently. References GTFS

fields.name: current_status
fields.description: Indicates the status of the vehicle in reference to a stop. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Degrees North, in the WGS-84 coordinate system. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Degrees East, in the WGS-84 coordinate system. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: gps_quality
fields.description: Indicates the quality of data and communication provided by the GPS.

fields.name: heading
fields.description: Heading, in degrees, clockwise from true north, e.g., 0 would mean north and 90 would mean east. This can be the compass bearing, or the direction towards the next stop or intermediate location. This should not be deduced from the sequence of previous positions, which clients can compute from previous data. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: speed
fields.description: Momentary speed measured by the vehicle, in meters per second. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: odometer
fields.description: Odometer value, in meters. References GTFS-Realtime

fields.name: schedule_deviation
fields.description: Indicates schedule adherence in seconds. A negative value represents an early vehicle. (An unscheduled trip would not have a scheduled deviation.)

fields.name: headway_deviation
fields.description: Indicates headway adherence in seconds. A negative value represents a shorter than scheduled headway.

fields.name: in_service
fields.description: Indicates status of travel with regard to service.

enum: Returning to a garage due to a suspension or breakdown
Travel for on-route replacement of breakdown

fields.name: schedule_relationship
fields.description: Indicates the status of the stop. References GTFS-realtime VehiclePosition.trip.schedule_relationship
